templates.intent: Get large mixing bowl from cabinet
Get small mixing bowl from cabinet
Get sharp bread knife from drawer
Mix dry ingredients in large bowl
Oil bowl and place dough for first rise
Activate yeast in warm water with sugar
Add wet ingredients to dry mix
First rise - let dough double in size
Knead dough until smooth and elastic
Place shaped loaf on baking sheet
Score top of loaf with bread knife
Bake bread for 30 minutes until golden
Cool bread on rack for 30 minutes
Get small bowl for yeast activation
Transfer dough to greased bowl and mark large bowl dirty
Cover dough with towel for rising
Oven management - preheat and turn off
Fresh bread ready to serve with clean kitchen
Fresh bread ready to serve with clean kitchen
Fresh bread ready to serve with clean kitchen
Gather toasted sesame seeds from pantry
Get doubanjiang (spicy chili bean paste) from pantry
Get fresh ramen noodles from pantry
Heat sesame oil in large pot over medium heat
Saut√© garlic, ginger, and shallot until fragrant (1-2 min)
Add ground pork and cook until browned (3-4 min)
Add doubanjiang and miso, stir to combine
Add sugar and sake, stir well
Pour in chicken stock and bring to simmer
Season broth with salt and white pepper to taste
Boil water in separate pot for noodles
Cook ramen noodles until al dente (15 sec less than package)
Divide noodles between 2 bowls and ladle hot broth over top
Miso ramen ready to serve with complete nutrition info
Get frozen berries cups from kitchen
Get protein powder scoops from kitchen
Get almond milk cups from kitchen
Add all ingredients to blender and blend until smooth
Berry protein smoothie ready to drink with complete nutrition info
